description: Aligns and averages two or more volumes using minctracc for alignment and mincresample and mincaverage for resampling.

output_spec.title: Output Specification
output_spec.description: Output file or directory (for COR format)

input_files.title: Input Files
input_files.description: Input volume files, specified multiple times for multiple files

target.title: Target File
target.description: Use the specified target instead of the first input file

wild.title: Wild Flag
wild.description: Assume unmatched arguments are input files

cm.title: Conform to Min Voxel Size Flag
cm.description: Make COR volumes conform to minimum voxel size

debug.title: Debug Flag
debug.description: Print detailed debug information to screen
